name: Pong Clone (Byeka)
description:
Thanks for playing my free Pong clone!

This is a clone of the popular arcade game I have developed, as part of a free YouTube tutorial series where I teach you how to make it yourself.

If you would like to learn how to code, visit "Unity Game Programming for Beginners" on YouTube, where you can learn how to make your own version of this exact game.

Otherwise, please simply enjoy playing Pong!

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7Nd7Is5Jzn8&list=PLydLF_SVNKYbAEsCrAzL1l3go4i-Wh5cr
